text: @WhiteHouse We’re in the middle of a pandemic with 750,000 confirmed #COVID19 cases & 40,000 deaths and @realDonaldTrump cannot help himself from calling the @FBI "scum" for investigating his illegal activity. #TrumpPressConf https://t.co/0o7KSZVGyt
